If deletion or anonymization is not possible (e.g., because your information is stored in backup archives), we will securely store your information and isolate it from any further processing until deletion is possible.
If you are a Visitor, you may have directly provided us with your information.
If you are an End-User, we have been provided with your information, and handle your information subject to an agreement with one of our customers.
In addition, we may share your information with third party service providers assisting with the application and recruitment process.
Our customer determines how we collect or use your data, and provides us with instructions on what to do with it in our agreement with them.
Privacy Policy

Job Candidate / Applicant Information

What Kind of Information Do We Collect?
Pursuant to the Data Privacy Framework Principles, we are obligated to inform EU, UK, and Swiss individuals whose data is transferred to the United States that we may be required to release that information in response to lawful requests by public authorities including to meet national security and law enforcement requirements.
This includes assessing your skills and qualifications, verifying your information, carrying out reference checks, carrying out background checks and improving our recruitment processes.
This means that we do not determine how we collect or use your data.
We may also keep this information on file to contact you about future opportunities unless you ask us not to do this.
We may also share your information with certain third-party service providers.
We may collect and process your information when you:
We may use your information in the following ways:
We only collect and use your data in accordance with the agreement between us and our client.
We use the information to analyse the site traffic, but we do not examine this information for individually identifying information.
We will only ever access your information to the extent required, and with the permission of our customer.
We will only use your information in connection with the services that we provide to our customer in accordance with the agreement between us and our customer.
What Types of Information do We Collect?
When you visit our Sites, portals or use our SaaS or Subscription Services, we may also collect certain information automatically from your device as further explained in the Cookies and Other Tracking Technologies section below.
Your information will either have been provided to us by our customer if they have set your account up for you, or provided to us by you where our customer has invited you to set up an account or submit information such as a resume.
Broadly, the types of data we collect may include: Account details (username, password, login details, profile details);

In addition to the cookies that we own, we may also use third-party cookies on our Sites for the purposes detailed above.
Our site may use session cookies, persistent cookies, and web beacons.
Our site uses cookies to distinguish you from other visitors to provide you with a better experience and to help us improve our site.
Purposes of Cookie use

We use Cookies for several purposes.
We also use analytics cookies to collect information about your use of our site, and to enable us to improve the way our site works.
We may collect and use the following categories of personal data about you (some or all may apply to you): Cookies data
We may use web beacons alone or in conjunction with cookies to compile information about your usage of our site and interaction with emails from us.
